body:
## Checklist before requesting a review

- [x] I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my code.

## Description

- Fix vertical scrolling. This is more noticeable when you have several custom asset definitions created and enabled.
- Fix bad styles when clicking a top-level menu item when the menu is collapsed. When collapsed, the visibility of the submenu is handled by CSS when you hover over the top-level items. However, Bootstrap was still trying to handle showing them if you clicked a top-level item and it resulted in unexpected margins in the popover.
